    • getInt

      public static int getInt(String prompt, String error, int[] accepted_values)
      get an int input value from user's keyboard
      Parameters:
      prompt - question to ask the user in order to get the value
      error - response when an error occurs
      accepted_values - list of accepted values. if null, no constraints.
      Returns:
      the integer value
